description: Source code for API endpoints related to assessments in a FastAPI application, defining routes for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting assessments, with dependencies on a service layer and database.

methods.name: get_assessments_service
methods.description: Dependency provider function for injecting an instance of AssessmentsService, initialized with a database connection from the request.

methods.name: list_assessments
methods.description: API endpoint to list assessments, supports pagination, returns a list response.

methods.name: get_assessment
methods.description: API endpoint to fetch a specific assessment by its ID.

methods.name: create_assessment
methods.description: API endpoint to create a new assessment based on provided payload.

methods.name: update_assessment
methods.description: API endpoint to update an existing assessment identified by ID.

methods.name: delete_assessment
methods.description: API endpoint to delete an assessment by ID.
